name: voluptuousness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being soft, curved, and sexually attractive: The show's creative team put her in costumes that emphasized her voluptuousness. Her voluptuousness was not an act of conscious enticement.
the quality of feeling extremely soft and comfortable, or of sounding or looking extremely beautiful: the soft voluptuousness of summer A craftsman can give the back of a simple settee a gentle curve that is sheer voluptuousness. See
voluptuous
More examplesFewer examplesA small amount of cream added to soup adds such voluptuousness and rounds out the flavour.The freshness of early summer has begun to acquire the warm voluptuousness of the middle of the year.The composer is known for both his voluptuousness and his precision.
